revision.comment: Portuguese: major cleanup of pronuns, etyms, usexes, etc. (manually assisted)
revision.text: ==Portuguese== ===Etymology=== From the abbreviated form of {{der|pt|grc|Χριστός||Christ}} found in manuscripts.<ref>{{R:pt:Infopédia}}</ref><ref>{{R:pt:Priberam}}</ref><ref>{{cite-web |work=Ciberdúvidas |title=A história e o significado da expressão XPTO |author=Gonçalo Neves |url=https://ciberduvidas.iscte-iul.pt/artigos/rubricas/idioma/xpto/3531 |date=April 15, 2017}}</ref> ===Pronunciation=== {{pt-IPA|pt=xis pê tê ó}} ===Adjective=== {{pt-adj|inv=1}} # {{lb|pt|colloquial}} [[cutting-edge]] {{gloss|representing the forefront, or position of greatest advancement}} #* {{quote-web |1=pt |date=09.07.2014 |author=Catarina Fonseca |title=Tudo o que os homens e as mulheres deviam saber uns sobre os outros |work=Activa |url=http://activa.sapo.pt/sexo/2014-07-09-Tudo-o-que-os-homens-e-as-mulheres-deviam-saber-uns-sobre-os-outros |text=É o carro topo de gama, a aparelhagem '''xpto''', a televisão e o computador última geração, a par de CDs, DVDs, livros, e outros gadgets. |t=It's the high-end car, the '''cutting-edge''' stereo, the next generation television and computer, along with CDs, DVDs, books, and other gadgets.}} ===References=== <references/>
